name: Alvin Carl Plantinga
alma_mater: Calvin College, University of Michigan, Yale University
notable_ideas: Reformed epistemology, Plantinga's free will defense
influences: Thomas Reid·  Edmund Burke· St. Thomas Aquinas· Dante Alighieri· St. Thomas More· Abraham Kuyper· Luis de Molina
influenced: Nicholas Wolterstorff, Peter van Inwagen, William Lane Craig, Michael Rea, Robin Collins, Keith DeRose, Robert Koons, Trenton Merricks, Michael Bergmann
